user_input:
Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. 
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Do not access any PLEXOS database. Generate hourly profiles with node splitting enabled and export to TST format for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE across years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly demand profiles for carrier 'Hybrid Heat Pump' for TYNDP 2026 scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030,2035,2040,2050]. Enable node splitting. No PLEXOS database access. Prepare outputs for downstream TST export.

tasks.description: Generate hourly demand profiles for the Hybrid Heat Pump carrier for TYNDP 2026 Scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting enabled.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) for years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050 with node splitting; no PLEXOS DB access.', configure the demand processor accordingly.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles to TST format for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', export the newly generated hourly profiles for carrier 'Hybrid Heat Pump' covering scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050 into TST workbooks.
